name: Golf Monday
description:
A Golf Game Like No Other

Welcome to the national amateur golf tournament at Oakvale Meadows!

Avoid the sand traps and water hazards, score birdies and eagles, make new friends, and win the day. Enjoy a golf experience where you not only need to aim your shots, but also keep your social relations finely tuned. Luckily everybody is well rested and in their best mood.

Features

  • Fully featured course with 18 holes of varying difficulty!
  • Enjoy interacting with fellow golfers!
  • Drive golf carts if you're in a hurry!
  • Customise your golfer!
  • Chill and no-stress gameplay!
